subject: United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: As was the case with the men’s Open, the women’s will play longer than any previous women’s Open course. Yet the greens, rather than the length and the rough, will likely pose the biggest challenge.
snippet: As was the case with the men’s Open, the women’s will play longer than any previous women’s Open course. Yet the greens, rather than the length and the rough, will likely pose the biggest challenge.
